entries.title: bGraphic Founded
entries.description: Queen Raae establishes bGraphic, her original web development company, laying the foundation for a decade-plus journey of building beautiful websites and digital experiences.

entries.title: Early WordPress Adventures
entries.description: Diving deep into WordPress development, building custom themes and plugins for clients across Norway. The seeds of future expertise in content management systems.

entries.title: Meeting Ola
entries.description: Life-changing encounter with Ola Vea, future husband and business partner. The beginning of a beautiful partnership both personally and professionally.

entries.title: Lillian Born & Lilly Labs Era Begins
entries.description: The arrival of daughter Lillian transforms everything. bGraphic evolves into Lilly Labs, representing the family-first business philosophy that would define the next chapter.

entries.title: React & Modern JavaScript
entries.description: Embracing the React revolution and modern JavaScript tooling. Building more interactive, dynamic web applications for clients while staying ahead of the tech curve.

entries.title: Gatsby Plugins Era
entries.description: Discovering Gatsby and becoming a prolific contributor to the ecosystem. Creating plugins, writing tutorials, and building a reputation in the Gatsby community.

entries.title: First Conference Talks
entries.description: Taking the stage at developer conferences, sharing insights about Gatsby, React, and building sustainable development practices. Finding her voice as a speaker.

entries.title: COVID Pivots & Resilience
entries.description: Navigating the pandemic challenges while maintaining business growth. Adapting to remote work, virtual conferences, and new ways of connecting with the community.

entries.title: POW! App Launch
entries.description: Launching POW! - the email for people who never check email. An innovative approach to email management that reflects Queen's philosophy of intentional communication.

entries.title: Slow & Steady Podcast
entries.description: Starting the 'Slow & Steady' podcast, sharing insights about bootstrapping, family business, and sustainable growth. Building an audience of fellow entrepreneurs and developers.

entries.title: Remote Work Mastery
entries.description: Perfecting the art of remote work and distributed teams. Setting up systems and processes that allow for maximum flexibility while maintaining high-quality output.

entries.title: Galleon (MCP for Ghost) Started
entries.description: Beginning development of Galleon, a Model Context Protocol implementation for Ghost CMS. Bridging the gap between AI tools and content management systems.

entries.title: AI Gain Concept
entries.description: Developing the 'AI Gain' framework - how to leverage AI for productivity gains while maintaining human creativity and authentic voice. A philosophy for the AI era.

entries.title: Jean-Claw Created
entries.description: Bringing Jean-Claw to life - Queen's AI assistant and co-pilot. The beginning of a new era of AI-human collaboration in running Lilly Labs and managing daily operations.

entries.title: Outseta Fractional Work
entries.description: Starting fractional CTO work with Outseta, bringing expertise in product development and technical leadership to growing SaaS companies.

entries.title: CTO Roundtable Investment
entries.description: Participating in the CTO Roundtable Invest initiative, connecting with fellow tech leaders and exploring investment opportunities in the Norwegian startup ecosystem.

entries.title: queen.raae.codes Redesign
entries.description: Complete overhaul of the personal website with a beautiful new design system, focusing on storytelling, community building, and showcasing the full breadth of Queen's journey.

entries.title: 'Is it Queen or AI?' Quiz & Livestreams
entries.description: Launching the interactive Queen vs AI quiz and regular livestreams, exploring the boundaries between human and AI communication while building community engagement.
